name: Sarah Mitchell
subject: Mathematics
bio: Experienced math tutor with a Master's in Applied Mathematics from MIT. Specializes in Calculus, Linear Algebra, and Statistics. Offers free 30-minute demo sessions.

name: James Okonkwo
subject: Physics
bio: PhD candidate in Theoretical Physics at University of Lagos. Passionate about making complex physics concepts accessible to all students.

name: Yuki Tanaka
subject: English / ESL
bio: Native English speaker living in Japan, specialising in Business English and exam preparation (IELTS, TOEFL). Over 5 years of ESL teaching experience.

name: Priya Sharma
subject: Chemistry
bio: MSc Chemistry graduate from IIT Delhi. Expert in Organic and Inorganic Chemistry, helping students excel in A-levels and university entrance exams.

name: Carlos Mendez
subject: Spanish
bio: Native Spanish speaker from Mexico City with a degree in Linguistics. Offers conversational Spanish, grammar, and cultural immersion sessions.

name: Amara Diallo
subject: Computer Science
bio: Full-stack software engineer and CS tutor. Covers Python, Java, web development, algorithms, and data structures. Great for students preparing for coding interviews.
